title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 - May 27 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 - May 27 2022
description:
Clay hosts solo while Buck takes a day off. Police press conference in Uvalde, Texas. The police response looks more and more incompetent. Why did they wait an hour before going in to take out the shooter? How could the police not go after the suspect for an hour? Why did a teacher prop open the door? It was a series of cataclysmic failures. Police officer caller with active shooter training weighs in.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Clay hosts solo while Buck takes a day off. Police press conference in Uvalde, Texas. The police response looks more and more incompetent. Why did they wait an hour before going in to take out the shooter? How could the police not go after the suspect for an hour? Why did a teacher prop open the door? It was a series of cataclysmic failures. Police officer caller with active shooter training weighs in.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

itunes:summary: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis joins Clay to talk baseball and Memorial Day. Clay takes more calls from law-enforcement on the Texas school shooting. Clay talks to Nick Leo, who reached out to Clay to get a signed letter from President Trump for his 99-year-old WWII vet grandfather.
itunes:author: Premiere Networks
